q.quote: Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them.
q.author: A. A. Milne

q.quote: I look good. I feel good and not to sound conceited I sound great.
q.author: A. J. McLean

q.quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun
q.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

q.quote: Freedom is never given; it is won.
q.author: A.Philip Randolph

q.quote: Decisions are made by those who show up
q.author: Aaron Sorkin

q.quote: Computers will be able to do all the mundane tasks in our daily lives
q.author: Aaron Swartz

q.quote: I'm pretty goofy. I laugh at my own jokes.
q.author: Abby Wambach

q.quote: It is always dangerous to underestimate anybody.
q.author: Abdullah II of Jordan

q.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence
q.author: Abigail Adams

q.quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar
q.author: Abraham Lincoln

q.quote: What a man can be, he must be. This need we call self-actualization.
q.author: Abraham Maslow

q.quote: The bottom line: health care reform is about the patient, not about the physician.
q.author: Abraham Verghese

q.quote: I shall, in due time, be a Poet
q.author: Ada Lovelace

q.quote: My first car was a motorcycle.
q.author: Adam Corolla

q.quote: Now that I'm a parent, I understand why my father was in a bad mood a lot
q.author: Adam Sandler
